amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to pay any fine assessed against a military installation by the California Air Resources Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 51 printed in House Report 113-170 to provide that none of the funds made available in this act may be used to pay any fine assessed against a military installation by the California Air Resources Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 188 (Roll no. 402).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 188 (Roll no. 402).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
